## Source: kam193 (f057dff70b37ff4a7cf923a36404dd6aea73f24657f0ffc39aa6641f91d0a795)
Package contains a reverse shell.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
Campaign: 2025-03-certifications
Reasons (based on the campaign):
 - The package contains code to create a reverse shell, allowing an attacker to execute any commands on the victim's machine.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0515ead14660dcbffe28456794b1f84f6a8416f72a81ede8833f475644c70afd)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'certifications' @ 999.999.999 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
